pkgmetadata.longdescription: Group-Adaptive Elastic Net Penalised Generalised Linear Models // Fit linear and logistic regression models penalised with group- adaptive elastic net penalties. The group penalties correspond to groups of covariates defined by a co-data group set. The method accommodates inclusion of unpenalised covariates and overlapping groups. See Van Nee et al. (2021) arXiv:2101.03875.
